snippet: An 11-year-old boy killed his 12-year-old brother in eastern Ohio, where the man they were with had gone target shooting with a friend, Sheriff Dale Williams of Carroll County said Tuesday.
abstract: Young boy fatally shoots 12-year-old brother in Lee Township, Ohio when man accompanying the two went target shooting with a friend, leaving the boys at a picnic table with three loaded weapons; no one has been charged.
lead_paragraph: An 11-year-old boy killed his 12-year-old brother in eastern Ohio, where the man they were with had gone target shooting with a friend, Sheriff Dale Williams of Carroll County said Tuesday.

headline.main: Ohio: Boy, 11, Picks Up Gun and Kills His Brother, 12
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Boy, 11, Picks Up Gun and Kills His Brother, 12
